This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, with a total of 13 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2008 to 2013.
Conversely, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2015 to 2019.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is moderately constant which exists from 2013 to 2015.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2006 to 2008.
